attributes.action: be more specific about caffeine in view of today's guidelines that it may be GOOD for us ! and offer MS protection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please involve dieticians in substantial, evidence - based guidelines on this matter.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
